item.title: UX팀 스터디
item.description: 2024년, 첫번째 스터디 SSG (Static Site Generator) 자기만의 블로그를 생성합니다. archie 템플릿으로 해보는 연습을 합니다. :)

item.title: About
item.description: 뭐지? 어바웃 할말이 없다….. https://github.com/yuin/goldmark https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma https://github.com/muesli/smartcrop https://github.com/spf13/cobra https://github.com/spf13/viper Hugo is ideal for blogs, corporate websites, creative portfolios, online magazines, single page applications or even a website with thousands of pages. Hugo is for people who want to hand code their own website without worrying about setting up complicated runtimes, dependencies and databases. Websites built with Hugo are extremelly fast, secure and can be deployed anywhere including, AWS, GitHub Pages, Heroku, Netlify and any other hosting provider.
